content:
http://build.fhir.org/valueset-operation-expand.html#examples
In this example

POST [base]/ValueSet/23/$expand
[other headers]

{
"resourceType" : "Parameters",
"parameter" : [
{
"name" : "valueSet",
"resource" : {
"resourceType" : "ValueSet",
[value set details]
}
}
]
}

Since the value set is provided as an input parameter, why does the URL have valueset id ValueSet/23/$expand? This expansion should not depend on any value set instance.
Yep, that is an error in the example. The POST should be to [base]/ValueSet/$expand
@Yunwei Wang can you submit a technical correction?
